2017520.name: The Longest Path
2017520.description:
The Longest Path is a casual exploration and mini game filled world with procedurally generated biomes and real-world influenced locations. This game is about adventure and spending time with friends. While there are storylines and secrets to be discovered, the path is up to you. Construct buildings, set mini game high scores, or climb the tallest peaks in the land!

The initial world is inspired by the longest commercial street in Denver, CO and mimic the real world topology. Storylines are intended to include both fantasy and real world places that can bring awareness to places you didn't know existed. Plans include adding other regions of the world as development progresses.

Key Features

• Procedurally generated world with ability to blend real world map data
• Multiple biomes with unique NPCs and challenges
• Construct your home
• Mini games
• Intentionally non-combat focused
• Optional storylines to follow and learn more about the world
2017520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
